inclusion.criterion: meet the criteria for the diagnosis of localized provoked vulvodynia.
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: Patients who have failed or have been unable to tolerate previous attempts at systematic therapy or surgery will be specifically recruited.
inclusion.label: unknown

exclusion.criterion: The presence of a dermatologic or neurologic condition which is determined by the investigator to be the primary cause of the patient's pain.
exclusion.label: unknown

exclusion.criterion: Allergy to any of the medications or the base itself.
exclusion.label: unknown

exclusion.criterion: Concurrent use of the following medications. . The patient may enroll in the study after a two week washout from these medications.
exclusion.label: not_met

exclusion.criterion: Failure to obtain approval from the prescribing physician before stopping these medications.
exclusion.label: unknown

notes: Patient has history of ESRD on HD and peritoneal dialysis, but no mention of dermatologic or neurologic conditions. Patient was treated with Vanco for an extended course of 6 weeks given her recurrent C diff.
